headline: Gartner Forecasts Worldwide GenAI Spending to Reach $644 Billion in 2025
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., March 31, 2025--Worldwide generative AI (GenAI) spending is expected to total $644 billion in 2025, an increase of 76.4% from 2024, according to a forecast by Gartner, Inc.
